patient_info: Irritability,Personality changes,Tremor,Nausea,Abdominal pain,Hepatomegaly,Sleep disturbance,Poor appetite,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Increased urinary copper concentration,Elevated circulating aspartate aminotransferase concentration,Elevated circulating alanine aminotransferase concentration,Mania,Kayser-Fleischer ring
golden_diagnosis: 肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Hepatolenticular degeneration (Wilson disease)
2. Hepatic encephalopathy due to liver cirrhosis
3. Autoimmune hepatitis with neurological manifestations
4. Primary biliary cholangitis with associated psychiatric symptoms
5. Acute intermittent porphyria with abdominal pain and psychiatric features
6. Metabolic liver disease (e.g., tyrosinemia, glycogen storage disease)
7. Inherited metabolic disorders with hepatic and neurological involvement (e.g., Hunter syndrome)
8. Drug-induced liver injury with psychiatric and neurological symptoms
9. Viral hepatitis (e.g., hepatitis B or C) with hepatic encephalopathy
10. Mitochondrial hepatopathies with neurological manifestations (e.g., Alpers-Huttenlocher syndrome)
